attributes.action: Rules for illegal immigrants Similar to American
attributes.additional_details:
New law should be introduced and will help UK to lower the burden of UK tax payer money. illegal immigrants who do not have any criminal offence will help the economy by giving us a £15,000 initial fees to Home office and they paying consistant taxes for their work for next five year. While they will not be able to claim any public funds for next ten years in UK.

This law will help to strong the UK economy and avoiding those illegal immigrants who do not pay taxes to HMRC for their unauthorised work. In result, they will be able to become a part of good British society by contributing in it.
